meanings.definition: The ability to use both hands equally well.
meanings.sent1: Her ambidexterity allowed her to write with both hands effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: His ambidexterity in painting made him a sought-after artist.
meanings.sent3: The magician's ambidexterity with cards amazed the audience.
meanings.sent4: The athlete's ambidexterity on the field was like watching a symphony of movement.
meanings.sent5: The surgeon's ambidexterity in the operating room saved many lives.

meanings.definition: The quality of being able to perform tasks with either hand.
meanings.sent1: The pianist's ambidexterity allowed him to play complex pieces flawlessly.
meanings.sent2: She admired his ambidexterity in using tools for woodworking.
meanings.sent3: The chef's ambidexterity in the kitchen made cooking look like a dance.
meanings.sent4: His ambidexterity in sports made him a versatile player on the team.
meanings.sent5: The artist's ambidexterity with a brush created stunning masterpieces.
